name: awesome-claude-plugins (ComposioHQ)
description: [项目级] A curated list of Plugins that let you extend Claude Code with custom commands, agents, hooks, and MCP servers through the plugin system.。来源: https://github.com/ComposioHQ/awesome-claude-plugins

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A curated list of Plugins that let you extend Claude Code with custom commands, agents, hooks, and MCP servers through the plugin system.

来源: https://github.com/ComposioHQ/awesome-claude-plugins
语言: JavaScript
Stars: 1283
